content: flynn creek mittens by jeannette luna copyright 2025 luna fiber lab follow and share your makes using the #lunafiberlab and #flynncreekmittens hashtags happy knitting one of my favorite places in tennessee is the flynn creek holler a narrow valley between rolling hills in south- central jackson county winter mornings in flynn creek are misty and cold the perfect weather for throwing on a pair of mittens and taking a quiet walk along the creek these worsted-weight mittens are textured without being fussy use a non-superwash wool to showcase the basketweave pattern and stay toasty warm size | gauge p -
